abilities.name: Bright Look
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you put Luxray LV.X from your hand onto your Active Luxray , you may switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flash Impact
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage to 1 of your Pokémon, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.
